sense.def:
One's wages
je denar, ki ga nekomu vsak teden izplačajo za delo, zlasti za opravljanje ročnega ali nekvalificiranega dela.

seg.quote: My wages had not increased for two years.
...the problems of families bringing up children on a low wage.

sense.def:
To wage a campaign or war
pomeni začeti boj ali vojno in jo izvajati daljše obdobje;

seg.quote: ...the fierce struggle that had been waged against racism.
